page.title: 05POPULATION IN MARSHFIELD
page.content: Statistical figures are derived from the electoral roll for the Parish of Marshfield, which covers rather more ground than the survey area. The total population of the Parish in October 1984 was 1,221 persons, comprising 428 households (an average of 2.9 persons each). Of these people 225 (18.5%) were below the age of 18, and 241 (19.5%) over the age of 60. Population is growing slowly as more houses are built in the village. As a result, less than half the present population was born in Marshfield. The Parish Church records do not show full demographic changes. They exclude, for example, cremations in Bath or baptisms of other denominations. They do show an average of 8 deaths, 5 marriages and 12 baptisms a year.
